member.name: WBEM_UNSECAPP_FLAG_TYPE
member.summary: Used to control access checks on callbacks when using the method.

member.name: WBEM_UNSECAPP_FLAG_TYPE.WBEM_FLAG_UNSECAPP_DEFAULT_CHECK_ACCESS
member.summary: Unsecapp.exe reads the registry key UnsecAppAccessControlDefault to determine if it should authenticate callbacks.

member.name: WBEM_UNSECAPP_FLAG_TYPE.WBEM_FLAG_UNSECAPP_CHECK_ACCESS
member.summary: Unsecapp.exe authenticates callbacks regardless of the setting of the registry key UnsecAppAccessControlDefault.

member.name: WBEM_UNSECAPP_FLAG_TYPE.WBEM_FLAG_UNSECAPP_DONT_CHECK_ACCESS
member.summary: Unsecapp.exe does not authenticate callbacks regardless of the setting of the registry key UnsecAppAccessControlDefault.
